div.head: 大便壅結
div.div: major relief obstructed and bound; stools are obstructed and bound

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief obstructed and bound; stools are obstructed and bound

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with da bian mi 大便秘② , constipation. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shui yin fen 水銀粉 quoting Pu ji fang 普濟方 : 大腸壅結 , “obstruction of the large intestine”, writes: 大便 壅結 , “ Stools are obstructed and bound ”.
